ModMetaData.name: [HH] Smokeleaf Lite
ModMetaData.author: HohenHeizen
ModMetaData.description: A mod aimed at changing smokeleaf to be less deadly, and less stereotypical, while also adding a small production chain. --- Changelog: v1.4.0 -Readjusted numbers. -Changed Hashish description, wooops. v1.3.0 -Readded addicton adjusted mental states. Addiction numbers still need tweaking. -Adjusted Hash again. Halved everything but added to items needed. Added a Skill requirement to crafting. -Added an overdose chance to hashish for balancing. (Okay so you can die from smokeleaf again.) v1.2.0 -Adjusted Hash Work & Value. Adjusted other recipe costs for cleaner recipe management. v1.1.0 -Removed previous Herbal Medicine recipe, replacing with one that allows most cloth and wools. --- Contains: Smokeleaf Changes: • Getting high now effects Talking, Manipulation, and Moving instead of Conciousness • The High Effect now had 3 Stages. (buzzed, high, stoned) New Hediff: • Pneumonitis: (inflamamtion of lungs) Replaces Asthma as primary effect Asthma replaces Carcinoma New Recipes: • Make Hemp Fabric Requires: Crafting Spot, Tailoring Bench, Electric Tailoring Bench • Make Herbal Medicine from Smokeleaf Requires: Crafting Spot, Drug Lab (no research required) Recipe: 4xSmokeleaf leaves, 3xTextile • Make Hash from Smokeleaf Requires: Drug Lab (smokeleaf refining, 8 crafting skill) Recipe: 25xSmokeleaf leaves • Make Chemfuel from Smokeleaf Requires: Biofuel refinery (smokeleaf refining) Recipe: 70 Smokeleaf leaves (removed smokeleaf from organics fuel) New Research: Smokeleaf Refining Requires: 400 Research Version 1.2.0
